Name: Rococoa
Ingredients: 45 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
10 ml Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao
2.5 ml Torabhaig Peated Single Malt Whisky
5 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of dust outside of glass with chocolate powder.
Review: Subtly smoky chocolate and light rum.
History: Adapted from a drink created by Scott Tyrer at Bibis Italianissimo in Leeds, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Rococoa contains 128 calories
